data.name: ObserVR Beta
data.detailed_description:
ObserVR is a viewing application for watching multiple live videos directly from Twitch. Join a room with your friends and watch your favorite streamers, or join a public room and meet new people!

Key Features:

  • Watch Your Favorite Content
    With Twitch integration, you can follow up to four of your favorite streamers simultaneously.
  • Customize Your Environment
    Size and place your screens to your liking for the ultimate viewing experience.
  • Chat with Friends
    Voice chat functionality lets you talk to your friends, and head-tracking avatars give you a presence in the virtual world.
  • Interact with Objects from Your Favorite Games
    Weapons and more from major titles are populated into your streaming environment.

data.reviews:
“A solid free way to indulge in some streaming.”
Upload VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970, or AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
